forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 17 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the sun casts a gentle light over the city, hinting at a warm and inviting day. The sky is primarily clear, though a faint marine layer lingers along the edges of the bay, reminiscent of whispers on the wind that echo the iconic fog of the region. While visibility remains largely unobstructed, expect a slight drop in temperature as the afternoon progresses, inviting a comfortable coolness, especially with the westerly breeze that dances through the streets.

As the sun begins its descent, the subtle transition to cloudy skies signals a cozy evening ahead. A light cardigan or a breathable jacket would serve you well against the brisk winds that sweep through from the west-southwest, perfect for strolling along waterfront paths or perhaps finding solace in a quiet café. With the weather as it is, why not embrace the afternoon by exploring the vibrant streets, reveling in the eclectic mix of cultures, or perhaps settling into a local bookshop to lose yourself in pages that capture another world entirely? Embrace the charm of this moment, finding joy in the simple pleasures San Francisco offers.
